fileless_scriptload_cmdline.description: Searchable. Deobfuscated script content run in a fileless context by the process  Requires Windows sensor and Windows 10/Server version 1703 or later  For more information see here

fileless_scriptload_cmdline_length.description: Searchable. Character count of the deobfuscated script content run in a fileless context.  Requires Windows sensor and Windows 10/Server version 1703 or later  For more information see here

fileless_scriptload_cmdline_raw.description: Searchable. Deobfuscated command lines of fileless scripts  Note: This field's value is untokenized.  Requires Windows sensor and Windows 10/Server version 1703 or later  For more information see here

fileless_scriptload_hash.description: Searchable. SHA-256 hash(es) of the deobfuscated script content run by the process in a fileless context.  Requires Windows sensor and Windows 10/Server version 1703 or later  For more information see here
